feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 7:30 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to wet snow near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Wet snow changing to snow late in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Windy. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
